statements: SELECT player_name, from_team, to_team FROM PlayerTransferHistory WHERE player_id = 12345
SELECT * FROM PlayerTransferHistory WHERE player_name = 'Messi'
SELECT player_name, transfer_date FROM PlayerTransferHistory ORDER BY transfer_date DESC
SELECT player_name, DATEDIFF(transfer_date, CURDATE()) AS days_since_transfer FROM PlayerTransferHistory
SELECT player_name, from_team, to_team FROM PlayerTransferHistory WHERE transfer_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT player_name, to_team, transfer_date FROM PlayerTransferHistory WHERE from_team = 'Real Madrid';
SELECT * FROM PlayerTransferHistory WHERE transfer_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, from_team FROM PlayerTransferHistory WHERE player_name LIKE 'C%';
SELECT player_name, transfer_date FROM PlayerTransferHistory WHERE to_team = 'FC Barcelona' ORDER BY transfer_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerTransferHistory WHERE from_team IN ('Chelsea', 'Manchester City') AND transfer_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM player_transfer_history;
SELECT player_id, from_team_id, transfer_date FROM player_transfer_history WHERE transfer_fee > 100000;
SELECT player_id, to_team_id, transfer_fee FROM player_transfer_history ORDER BY transfer_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT to_team_id FROM player_transfer_history;
SELECT player_id, trade_date FROM trade_records WHERE trade_value < 50000;
SELECT player_id, from_team_id, to_team_id, transfer_date, transfer_fee FROM player_transfer_history WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, from_team_id, to_team_id, transfer_date, transfer_fee FROM player_transfer_history WHERE transfer_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT player_id, from_team_id, to_team_id, transfer_date, transfer_fee FROM player_transfer_history ORDER BY transfer_fee DESC;
SELECT player_id, from_team_id, to_team_id, transfer_date, transfer_fee FROM player_transfer_history WHERE player_id = 1 AND transfer_fee > 5000;
SELECT player_id, from_team_id, to_team_id, transfer_date, transfer_fee FROM player_transfer_history WHERE from_team_id = 10 ORDER BY transfer_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, previous_team, new_team, transfer_date FROM TransferHistory;
SELECT trade_id, player_id, from_team, to_team, trade_date FROM TradeRecords ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, country FROM TeamDetails WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, previous_team, new_team, transfer_date FROM TransferHistory WHERE player_id = 10;
SELECT player_id, previous_team, new_team, transfer_date FROM TransferHistory WHERE transfer_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM TransferHistory WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY transfer_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT team_name, country FROM TeamDetails WHERE team_name LIKE 'Real%' ORDER BY country, team_name;
SELECT player_id, previous_team, new_team, transfer_date FROM TransferHistory WHERE previous_team = 'Barcelona' OR new_team = 'Real Madrid';
SELECT trade_id, player_id, from_team, to_team, trade_date FROM TradeRecords WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM TeamDetails WHERE team_name IN ('Barcelona','Real Madrid','Liverpool') ORDER BY country ASC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerTransferHistory;
SELECT team_name, country FROM Team ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, from_team_id, to_team_id, transfer_date FROM PlayerTransferHistory WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT league_name, prize_pool FROM EsportsLeague WHERE prize_pool > 10000;
SELECT * FROM TradeRecords WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT player_id, from_team_id, to_team_id, transfer_date FROM PlayerTransferHistory WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY transfer_date DESC;
SELECT team_id, team_name, country FROM Team WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT trade_id, player_id, from_team_id, to_team_id, trade_date FROM TradeRecords WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT league_id, league_name, prize_pool FROM EsportsLeague WHERE prize_pool > 1000 ORDER BY prize_pool DESC;
SELECT player_id, from_team_id, to_team_id, transfer_date FROM PlayerTransferHistory ORDER BY player_id ASC, transfer_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Player;
SELECT player_name, date_of_birth FROM Player WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM Player ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, country FROM Team WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT player_name, date_of_birth FROM Player WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT player_name, date_of_birth FROM Player WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM Player JOIN Team ON Player.team_id = Team.team_id;
SELECT player_name, team_name, transfer_date FROM Player JOIN TransferHistory ON Player.player_id = TransferHistory.player_id JOIN Team ON TransferHistory.to_team_id = Team.team_id;
SELECT player_name, tournament_name FROM Player JOIN TradeRecords ON Player.player_id = TradeRecords.player_id JOIN Tournament ON TradeRecords.team_id = Tournament.tournament_id;
SELECT player_name, country FROM Player JOIN Team ON Player.team_id = Team.team_id WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
